properties.title: Pump track Steckborn
properties.abstract: With rather flat curves, various loops and jump elements, the pump track is suitable for beginners and advanced riders alike. Thanks to its asphalt surface, it can be ridden in any weather.
properties.description:
The 1650 m2 pump track in Steckborn is located directly in front of the school building. Because its curves are not very high or steep, it is ideally suited for children. But with several loops that can be combined and elements that invite you to jump, experts will also get their money's worth. 

Thanks to the asphalt, the pump track is completely weatherproof, although it can become slippery when wet. However, it dries in a good 30 minutes and can then be used again. It is also suitable for inline skates, scooters and skateboards.

Surface: Asphalt
Area: 1650 m2
Length: 350 metres
Wave and curve height: 30-100 cm
